Technical documentation¶

my_requests.print_FriendsToFile(user, number, file)¶
Input: user, <class ‘int’> - id of the user to get a list of friends for

number, <class ‘int’> - the number of friends to return file, <class ‘str’> - file name

Return: <class ‘NoneType’>, the function writes information about friends to a file

my_requests.print_ListOfDicts(l)¶
my_requests.print_dict(d, indent=4, local_indent=0)¶
Input: d, <class ‘dict’>

indent, <class ‘int’> - the number of spaces in the indentation, constant, equal to 4 local_indent, <class ‘int’> - the number of spaces, added to each line in the output

Return: <class ‘str’>, it contains a “beautiful” RECURSIVE representation of the input
